Package org.smartfrog.services.xml.interfaces

Interface Summary
LocalNode This is not a remote interface; it is a local interface that both SimpleXmlNode and CompoundXmlNode implement to look similar
XmlAttribute XML Attributes: QName + value
XmlComment XML Comments
XmlDocType DTD declaration
XmlDocument XML Document
XmlElement XML elements
XmlNamespaceDeclaration Namespace declaration
XmlNode XML node class
XmlProcessingInstruction  
XmlQNameNode Nothing implements this, but other interfaces extend it; it represents nodes with a qname value
XmlSource for things that are sources of XML data.
XmlTextNode XML Text Node
XmlWireCodec created 27-Jul-2005 13:31:16
